room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: Only my second escape room and loved it. We did the Blitzkrieg room. Fun theme. Challenging but not impossible. Staff was helpful and friendly. This is a great activity for friends or family.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: First time at this place and we are hooked. The Blitzkrieg room was so well done. The clues, the setting and the staff were phenomenal. Already booked our next room. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: Our family did the Blitzkrieg challenge and it was great! Very realistic and challenging - lots of interaction and immersion. Great set and props, very well done and period realistic. The overall facility was great and the staff was extremely courteous and helpful. We will be back! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: We did the Blitzkrieg room. We have done several escape rooms and this was one of the best. Challenging and unique puzzles with a lot of variety and very cool engineering. Very immersive with authentic props, accessories and sound effects. Well done! Can't wait to try the next one.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: I tested the Blitzkrieg escape room and it was amazing. I've been to quite a few and this place made you feel like you were in Germany. Without giving away too much, authentic time appropriate props, sound effects, great traps.....must do it again. I failed to escape but had a ball failing. Put on your thinking caps!
